name: Safety
description:
This is a game about a child seeking help in a toxic family system.

It is semi-autobiographical.

Though Safety is not visually graphic and never portrays the primary abuser on screen, it contains adult themes and may be triggering or distressing for some players. Player discretion is advised.

Please note the following content warnings:

  • Portrayal of emotional abuse
  • Portrayal of verbal abuse
  • Implied risk of CSA (though never depicted)

Part of 5-Years-O-Bitsy Game Jam, under the prompt "help!"

Thank you for playing!
